Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add cycle-based MIP solver with exact race simulation

- Add solve_rotation_cycle\(\) that models a single repeating cycle
  instead of entire race \(~66% fewer variables, ~3x faster\)
- Add expand_cycle_to_race\(\) helper for schedule expansion
- Implement wrap-around fatigue tracking \(Link[p] variable\)
- Exact stint-by-stint race time calculation \(handles partial cycles\)
- Exact paddler stats from simulation \(not scaled approximation\)
- seat_entry_weight with wrap-around, first stint free \(t0_weight scaling\)
- Pattern penalties not supported in cycle model \(not applicable\)
- Add Example 6 comparing cycle vs full-race solver
- Update OPTIMIZATION_PLAN.md with cycle model documentation
- Add CLAUDE.md with uv run reminder

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Clean up codebase: keep only cycle-based solver

- Remove solve_rotation_full \(unused full-race model\)
- Update meta.py optimize_stint_range with all parameters
- Simplify exports in __init__.py
- Rewrite examples to use only solve_rotation_cycle
- Fix example 3 crew size \(8 paddlers, 4 seats, 4 resting\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add per-paddler cycle rules display

Instead of showing a stint-by-seat table, display each paddler''s
rotation pattern as a simple rule string:

  Eduardo: Seat 3* -> Rest -> Seat 6

where * marks the starting position. This is clearer for each
crew member to understand their individual rotation.

- Add format_cycle_rules\(\) helper function in model.py
- Add cycle_rules to return dict from solve_rotation_cycle\(\)
- Add cycle_rules to meta.py optimize_stint_range\(\) results
- Update all examples to display cycle rules
- Export format_cycle_rules from __init__.py

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
